member.name: ISyncMgrHandlerCollection.BindToHandler
member.summary: Instantiates a specified sync handler when called by Sync Center.
member.param: The ID of the sync handler.

The IID of the requested interface. This will typically be IID_ISyncMgrHandler. If the method fails when passed IID_ISyncMgrHandler, it is recalled using IID_ISyncMgrSynchronize, the IID of the older interface. When the method returns successfully, a pointer to the requested interface is referenced in the ppv parameter.
When this method returns, contains an address of a pointer to an interface representing the sync handler.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrHandlerCollection.GetHandlerEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator that provides access to the IDs of sync handlers exposed to and managed by the user.
member.param: When this method returns, contains an address of a pointer to an instance of that enumerates the IDs of known sync handlers.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrHandlerCollection
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide an enumerator of sync handler IDs and instantiate those sync handlers.
